      • getDescriptionOfMoney

        public static java.lang.String getDescriptionOfMoney(int aValue)
        Returns the amount of money in gold coins, silver coins and theCopper coins.
        • 1 silver = 10 copper
        • 1 gold = 10 silver
        Returns:
        String description of the amount of money, for example "3 gold coins, 2 silver coins". Returns an empty string if no money is present.

      • getDescriptionOfItem

        public static java.lang.String getDescriptionOfItem(java.lang.String adject1,
                                    java.lang.String adject2,
                                    java.lang.String adject3,
                                    java.lang.String noun,
                                    boolean with_a_or_an)
        get a description based on the adjectives and the noun.
        Parameters:
        adject1 - String containing the first adjective.
        adject2 - String containing the second adjective.
        adject3 - String containing the third adjective.
        noun - String containing the noun.
        with_a_or_an - indicates if the word should include an a or an an.
        Returns:
        String containing the description in the format: "an/a [adject1], [adject2], [adject3] [noun]".

      • isVowel

        public static boolean isVowel(char aChar)
        Returns whether or not a character is a vowel.
        Parameters:
        aChar - the character to check
        Returns:
        boolean which is true if the character is a vowel.

      • addInventory

        public static void addInventory(java.util.Set<Item> set,
                java.lang.StringBuilder builder)
        Adds a descriptive set of the items to the string builder.
        Parameters:
        set - a set of items to be described.
        builder - the builder to append to. Should not be null.
